items.title: Tennis star Naomi Osaka sells SoCal home back to Nick and Vanessa Lachey in savvy  $7.9 million deal
items.description: Osaka sold the Tarzana, Calif., estate back to reality TV host couple Nick and Vanessa Lachey for $7.9 million—just 3 years after buying it from them ...

items.title: Here’s the $863 billion secret Powell, Trump and Bessent aren’t telling us about gold and bitcoin
items.description: The inevitable gold-price reckoning that could fund Trump’s bitcoin ambitions — and sting your bank account.

items.title: Off-price retailer Ross flashes another sign that consumers are seeking discounts this fall
items.description: Ross Stores joins TJ Maxx parent in seeing consumers flock to their discounted merchandise.

items.title: I’m single, 75, and living with kidney disease and a pacemaker. I’ve no long-term care insurance. Will I be OK?
items.description: “My income is $120,000 per year which includes $60,000 in Social Security and a pension.”

items.title: ‘I’ve been kept in poverty’: Do I take a $70K job at 74 and lose my Section 8 housing allowance?
items.description: “After the age of 50, I really only had sporadic contract work and I had to sell my house.”
